mapper.select: SELECT kid_no , kid_name , kid_birth , kid_address , kid_protector_phone , kid_precautions , kid_gender , kid_commuting , kid_entrance_day FROM kid LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kid ( license_kindergarten, kid_name, kid_birth, kid_address, kid_protector_phone, kid_protector_phone_reserve, kid_precautions, kid_gender, kid_commuting, kid_entrance_day) VALUES ( #{licenseKindergarten}, #{kidName}, #{kidBirth}, #{kidAddress}, #{kidProtectorPhone}, #{kidProtectorPhoneReserve}, #{kidPrecautions}, #{kidGender}, #{kidCommuting}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') );
mapper.select: select kid.kid_name, kid.kid_birth, kid.kid_address, kid.kid_protector_phone, kid.kid_protector_phone_reserve, kid.kid_precautions, kid.kid_gender, kid.kid_commuting, kid.kid_entrance_day from teacher_formation inner join kid_formation inner join kid where teacher_formation.class_no = kid_formation.class_no and teacher_formation.license_kindergarten = kid_formation.license_kindergarten and kid_formation.kid_no = kid.kid_no and teacher_formation.license_kindergarten = #{license} and teacher_formation.teacher_no = #{teacherNo} LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}
